text: le’inanite kehayimanoti yanini be’irisu nuhini yazezebetini denegegelachihu፡፡ yaninimi wedanite yaweredinewini yaninimi be’irisu ibirahimini musanina ‘isanimi yazezinibetini hayimanotini betikikili ak’wak’umu be’irisumi atileyayu maletini (denegegini)፡፡ be’agariwochu layi ya wederisu yemitit’erachewi negeri kebedachewi፡፡ alahi yemishawini sewi wede’irisu (imineti) yimerit’ali፡፡ yemimelesinimi sewi wederisu yimerali፡፡
